name: Frog flip (Lua on her computa)
description:
(Playing in full screen is recommended)

Uh oh! Lily accidentally did some stuff in visual studio and now she has not only spawned an evil laptop consuming ball but made all the enemies in her world not kill. Instead, they transform you which can be arguably worse. You now most kill the ball, get the computer back and reprogram the world back to normal in this cute little adventure.

Listen to the soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/user-83806200/sets/frog-flip-ost

If you're wondering how many drugs I took to make this game in under a day, I didn't. I've just been a huge workaholic so yeah that's the reason.

Also, if you're my friend Tomi please press the "0" key to bypass anything that remotely resembles among us.
